DOC.detailed_description: Primary endpoint : Assessment effectiveness treatment QRay1 prevent oral mucositis patient undergoing hematopoietic stem cell transplantation ( HSCT ) . Secondary endpoint : - Assessment mucositis associated- pain relief . - Assessment safety treatment QRay1 ( oral adverse event ) . - Assessment patient ' acceptance device . Study design : Double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled , 2 group ( randomization ratio 1:1 ) . Duration treatment : Daily treatment . Study-treatment administration begin initiation condition regimen ( visit 1 ) continue day 28 least day 21 patient mucositis ( WHO OMAS = `` 0 '' ) Light radiation dose : 60-70mW/cm2 ( administered 3 treatment area ) , start 45 second per surface , increase day interval 15 second , maximum 90 second per surface . Evaluation plan : Evaluation begin condition regimen initiate ( visit 1 ) continue weekly day 28 day 21 patient mucositis . A follow-up evaluation perform month discharge patient . Unusual clinical presentation address whenever observe . Criteria evaluation : Primary efficacy variable : Rate absent mucositis visit use WHO scale mucositis OMAS . Secondary efficacy variable : - Severity oral mucositis visit use WHO scale mucositis OMAS . - Severity oral pain visit use WHO scale mucositis OMAS . - Safety ( oral adverse event ) - Patients ' acceptance study drug 11-step ladder . Others - Compliance standard oral care ( chlorhexidine rinse , nystatin readymix , saline mouthwash )
